mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Ann Pamela Cunningham to George W. Riggs, 1859 May 27
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cunningham, Ann Pamela, 1816-1875
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter (copy) from Ann Pamela Cunningham to George W. Riggs, Treasurer, May 27, 1859. Written in the hand of her secretary, Mary McMakin. Mr. Washington permits Association to start repairs before taking possession. Advisory Committee meeting called. Asks him to have master builder inspect Mount Vernon and report; to visit Miss Hamilton in New York before her unofficial visit to Mount Vernon; J.A. Washington invites Upton Herbert for August if he accepts superintendent position.
